text: Magician Mahendralal from Delhi is a 1998 Indian Malayalam film directed by K Radhakrishnan and starring Bheeman Raghu and Jagathy Sreekumar in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Bheeman Raghu as S.I Kumar * Jagathy Sreekumar as H.C Kariya * Mala Aravindan as Mammad * Bobby Kottarakkara as Velayudhan * Shanavas as Sanal * Kuthiravattam Pappu as Shivan Pilla * Ravi Menon as Const.Vareethu ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Magician Mahendralal from Delhi
